name: Cat Game
description:
A very very VERY early prototype of what I hope will one day become a great platforming experience starring cats. Please excuse the everything for now, I promise to make it 100x more beautiful in the coming months.

It's a windows-only game for the time being, possibly forever. Sorry mac users, I don't have the tools to make a version for you right now. </3

Thank you so much for even viewing this page, it means the world to me! Please feel free to download and play this little baby demo free of charge, and feel free to leave any feedback you have in the comments below.

If you like this game please feel free to share the link with your friends!
